title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Commissioner
means the Commissioner of Agriculture and Markets of the State of New

York. (b) Person means any
individual, firm, partnership, corporation or association. (c) Milk dealer means any person licensed to
receive, purchase, handle or sell milk pursuant to article 21 of the

Agriculture and Markets Law and the applicable rules and regulations
promulgated thereunder by the commissioner. (d) Milk means all milk and milk products, as
defined pursuant to subdivision seven of section
253
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, whether in bulk or packaged form. (e) Payment means cash payment in full
received on or before the due date established pursuant to this Part. Payment
by check shall be treated as conditional payment but shall be defeated upon
dishonor of the check. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
44.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
